name: Disable-VSCodeTelemetry
commandPattern: $vscodeSettings = "$env:APPDATA\Code\User\settings.json"; if (Test-Path $vscodeSettings) { $settings = Get-Content $vscodeSettings -Raw | ConvertFrom-Json; $settings | Add-Member -MemberType NoteProperty -Name 'telemetry.telemetryLevel' -Value 'off' -Force; $settings | Add-Member -MemberType NoteProperty -Name 'telemetry.enableTelemetry' -Value $false -Force; $settings | Add-Member -MemberType NoteProperty -Name 'telemetry.enableCrashReporter' -Value $false -Force; $settings | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 100 | Set-Content $vscodeSettings } else { Write-Host 'VS Code settings not found. Install VS Code first.' }
